Judul: MODELING & SIMULATION OF STEWART PLATFORM MECHANISM WITH ROTARY ACTUATION SYSTEM
Abstrak:
Development of aircraft simulator has started since 1910 and has come a long
way since it began. The development has increases significantly because of the
computational technolgy has developed and computing time and calculation for
equations become much faster. Flight Physics Research Group ITB is one to
participate in developing through several research activities. In this research a
simulation of a motion platform, an important part of aircraft simulator, is done
using SimScape which is provided in MATLAB. This research is to see the
response of a motion platform called Stewart platform or hexapod manipulator as
a motion cue. The simulation uses uses several aircraft motions to be tested. The
simulation also see the response of both open-loop and closed-loop system.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Dr. Ir. Sigit Puji Santosa, MSME
Kata Kunci: Aircraft Simulator, Motion Platform, Motion Cue, SimScape, Simulation, Stewart Platform
